name: Garden's Bane Level Editor - Demo
description:
The following version is a demo for a full game which will include a level editor AND a story mode. The demo is just very much focused on the level editor and level design!

Summary

You are a sentient fruit, amongst a tribe of fruits who are all very conscience.  However, the Garden in which you live starts to be infiltrated by a corrupt plant, that has time and dimension warping abilities. You discover that you have a strange ability to move and jump very quickly, and to reach places no other fruit can. 

The crazy mad scientist of the tribe recruits you to be the hero the tribe needs to fend off this corrupt plant. Little did they know that it would take a time travelling journey through dimensions to find the source of the corruption and to end it for good.

Inspiration

Garden's Bane is a precision platformer, inspired by games such as Kirby Superstar, Donkey Kong Country, and Warioland, and even more modern indie titles such as Celeste and Super Meatboy.

The full version of this game is based off an original jam game project! If you are interested in trying out the original jam version of the game, you can check it out here!

Download Coming Soon!
